body:
Hey guys, back again with a spotlight. I will continue using the application format (https://goo.gl/forms/GCCz36F9XSOXVMfz2) for those who wish to have one of their own. If you sent an app last time, please do not send in another; your name will still be on the list. Anyways, I present to you, NuclearDucky!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
NuclearDucky and Nexus

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
Hi! I'm NuclearDucky but you can call me Ducky! I've been on avicus for years and enjoy talking to people! I don't bite. :D

​What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
 Clash Royale. It's the most addicting game I've ever played. :)

What interests you the most in life?
Cats.

What music/art/media do you like?
YouTube.

​Where are you from?
Virginia, USA

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?​
Playing nebula and checking/posting stuff on the forums here and there. :)

​Anything else you want to mention?
no

title: Community Spotlight #4 - NuclearDucky

replies.body: I wish it hadn't been removed. :<
